# Dough Divider & Rounders

Optimize Product Consistency and Efficiency

When it’s time to make a boatload of dinner rolls, hamburger buns and pizzas,
save time and produce consistent portion sizes with our dough dividers and
rounders. They free you from the task of dividing and rounding by hand for
more efficient and consistent results.

Semi Automatic Dough Divider & Rounder

Divide and round dough with uniform size and consistency, 16 times faster than
doing it by hand.

Automatic Dough Rounder

Round 7 to 36 ounce dough balls, gently and faster than rounding by hand

Hydraulic Dough Divider

Divide up to 35 pounds of dough into 20 even pieces, gently and evenly, up to
four times faster than doing it by hand

### Product Type __

Semi Automatic Dough Divider & Rounder

Automatic Dough Rounder

Hydraulic Dough Divider
